title: Amazon FBA/FBM Product Research VA – Part-Time | Keepa + SellerAmp Required | $3–$4/hr
job_overview:
Are you an experienced Amazon FBA Product Research VA looking for a flexible, part-time role with long-term potential? I'm a U.S.-based Amazon seller searching for someone who can deliver 10- 15 high-quality, profitable leads per week using Keepa and SellerAmp (SAS).

This is a performance-based position with steady, part-time hours. If you're detail-oriented, dependable, and already trained in online arbitrage sourcing, this could be the perfect role for you.
